name: GridSpace
description:
A very simple game made over the course of a few days in GameMaker. Gameplay is very straightforward - activate all of the nodes on the grid while avoiding the red dots. Get hit and you'll lose a life, but green dots will heal you. Includes several difficulty levels and the ability to set a custom difficulty.

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys: Change direction

Escape: Pause

Credits

Programming: Conor O' Donovan

Art: Conor O' Donovan

Engine: GameMaker: Studio

Sound: bfxr.net

Music: incompetech.com
